n: Easy Spiced Brown Rice With Corn
des: "An easy-to-prepare rice dish with frozen corn kernels seasoned with cumin and cilantro."
ins: In a saucepan, mix the water, rice, olive oil, and salt, and bring to a boil. Mix in the corn, cilantro, and cumin. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer 45 to 60 minutes, until the liquid has been absorbed.
